verses.verse: And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> with a <S%G3507>cloud:<s%> and a <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> was on his <S%G2776>head,<s%> and his <S%G4383>face<s%> was as it were the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> and his <S%G4228>feet<s%> as <S%G4769>pillars<s%> of <S%G4442>fire:<s%>

And he <S%G2192>had<s%> in his <S%G5495>hand<s%> a <S%G974>little<s%> <S%G974>book<s%> <S%G455>open:<s%> and he <S%G5087>set<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and his <S%G2176>left<s%> foot <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%>

And <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> as when a <S%G3023>lion<s%> <S%G3455>roars:<s%> and <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%> <S%G2980>uttered<s%> their <S%G5456>voices.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%> had <S%G2980>uttered<s%> their <S%G5456>voices,<s%> I was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1125>write:<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to me, <S%G4972>Seal<s%> up those things <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%> <S%G2980>uttered,<s%> and <S%G1125>write<s%> them not.

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G142>lifted<s%> up his <S%G5495>hand<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%>

And <S%G3660>swore<s%> by him that <S%G2198>lives<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%> who <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and the things that <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> are, and the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and the things that <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> are, and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and the things which are <S%G1722>therein,<s%> <S%G846><s%> that there should be <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>longer:<s%>

But in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he shall <S%G3195>begin<s%> to <S%G4537>sound,<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should be <S%G5055>finished,<s%> as he has <S%G2097>declared<s%> to his <S%G1401>servants<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>

And the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to me <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5217>Go<s%> and <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G974>little<s%> <S%G974>book<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G455>open<s%> in the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And I <S%G565>went<s%> to the <S%G32>angel,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1325>Give<s%> me the <S%G974>little<s%> <S%G974>book.<s%> And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G2983>Take<s%> it, and <S%G2719>eat<s%> it up; and it shall <S%G4087>make<s%> your <S%G2836>belly<s%> <S%G4087>bitter,<s%> but it shall be in your <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1099>sweet<s%> as <S%G3192>honey.<s%>

And I <S%G4327>took<s%> the <S%G974>little<s%> <S%G974>book<s%> out of the <S%G32>angel's<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G2719>ate<s%> it up; and it was in my <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1099>sweet<s%> as <S%G3192>honey:<s%> and as <S%G3753>soon<s%> as I had <S%G5315>eaten<s%> it, my <S%G2836>belly<s%> was <S%G4087>bitter.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, You <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2992>peoples,<s%> and <S%G1484>nations,<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> and <S%G935>kings.<s%>
